wClothesData.title: Floral V-Neck Midi Tiered Dress
wClothesData.desc: This floral dress from our Per Una collection has a tiered shape and full sleeves for a gorgeously floaty look. It's cut in a comfy regular fit, with a flattering v-neckline and gathers on the bodice for extra shaping.

wClothesData.title: Jersey Round Neck Midi Column Dress
wClothesData.desc: This jersey midi dress is a sophisticated addition to your wardrobe. It's designed in a regular fit, with long sleeves and an elegant column silhouette. A knot tie detail pulls in the waist and creates a beautiful drape through the body.

wClothesData.title: Floral Tie Neck Belted Midi Tiered Dress
wClothesData.desc: This floral midi dress is a wardrobe must. It's cut in a regular fit, with a tie belt at the waist and a tier on the skirt for a flattering shape. The neckline features a delicate ruffle and a tie fastening for a dainty finish. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

wClothesData.title: Floral Round Neck Midi Tiered Dress
wClothesData.desc: Designed with vintage-inspired charm, this Per Una floral dress makes an elegant addition to your wardrobe. It's cut to a comfortable regular fit, with tiers for a flattering shape. A round neck and puff sleeves keep the silhouette simple, while lace inserts bring a feminine touch.

wClothesData.title: Cotton Blend Jacquard Beach Cover Up Kaftan
wClothesData.desc: Channel beach chic with this on-trend cotton-blend jacquard kaftan. Designed in our regular fit with a mini length, this comfy cover-up sports a modern v-neck and stylish tie front with boho-inspired tassel ends. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

wClothesData.title: Modal Rich Crew Neck Relaxed Sweatshirt
wClothesData.desc: We've crafted this Goodmove collection sweatshirt from modal-rich fabric for a luxuriously soft feel while you work out. Part of our yoga range, this relaxed fit layer is knotted at the front for subtle shaping. Breathable, moisture-wicking and quick-drying material keeps you cool and dry as you move. Long sleeves, a crew neck and ribbed cuffs help you to stay warm post-exercise.

wClothesData.title: Pure Cotton Floral Long Sleeve Top
wClothesData.desc: Introduce a boho accent to your wardrobe with this pure cotton top from our Per Una range. It's cut in a comfortable regular fit with a classic round neckline. The long sleeves have a touch of volume for a flattering effect, while floral embroidery on the chest adds feminine detailing.

wClothesData.title: Pure Cotton Funnel Neck Sweatshirt
wClothesData.desc: Get ready for relaxed days in this pure cotton funnel neck sweatshirt. It's cut to a regular fit and is crafted from moisture-wicking, heavy loopback fabric. The high neck style fastens with a half zip for easy wear. The hem and cuffs are finished with ribbed trims for a snug feel.

wClothesData.title: Printed V-Neck Mini Waisted Dress
wClothesData.desc: This printed mini dress brings a playful pop to your day. It's cut in a regular fit, with tiers through the skirt and a shirred waist for flattering shaping. A lace insert runs either side of the v-neck and down the mock-button bodice for a feminine finish.

wClothesData.title: Quilted Long Sleeve Sweatshirt with Cotton
wClothesData.desc: A quilted pattern brings texture to this sweatshirt, which is crafted with cotton and added stretch for comfort. Regular fit, with ribbed trims around the crew neck and long-sleeved cuffs for a cosy feel. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes. .

wClothesData.title: Animal Print Round Neck Midi Waisted Dress
wClothesData.desc: When the occasion calls for boldness, reach for this animal print midi dress. We've created it in a regular fit with an elasticated waist for a flattering shape. Tiers on the skirt add a fun flourish along with ruffles at the shoulder, front and round neck.

wClothesData.title: Floral V-Neck Midaxi Wrap Dress
wClothesData.desc: It's the little details that make this floral dress from our Per Una range ultra-flattering. Cut to a comfortable regular fit, the wrap-style piece has a feminine v-neckline and a belted waist to accentuate your silhouette. It's designed with classic long sleeves and button cuffs, plus frill detailing for a romantic flourish.

wClothesData.title: Round Neck Knee Length Shift Dress
wClothesData.desc: Slip into this knee-length shift dress for easy everyday wear. It has a regular fit, with a button-down placket beneath the round neck so it can be opened up in warmer weather for a breezy feel. We've added gentle volume to the 3/4 length sleeves for an elegant finish. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.

wClothesData.title: Polka Dot Asymmetric Midi Tea Dress
wClothesData.desc: With its playful polka dots and flattering waisted shape, this tea dress is a true day-to-night hero. It's cut to a regular fit for throw-on-and-go appeal, with casual short sleeves and a round neck. The on-trend midi-length hem has an asymmetric finish for extra movement.
